properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Port Aransas to Matagorda Ship Channel out 20 NM; Bays and Waterways from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas; Bays and Waterways from Port Aransas to Port O'Connor
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 11 at 11:58AM CST until January 11 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds around 20 knots with gusts up to 30
knots expected.

* WHERE...Bays and Waterways from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas,
Bays and Waterways from Port Aransas to Port O'Connor and
Coastal waters from Port Aransas to Matagorda Ship Channel out
20 NM.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong to very strong winds and higher seas will
result in hazardous marine conditions especially for
inexperienced mariners with smaller vessels.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON
